name.ja: <ruby>月光銀狗<rt>ムーライト・シルバー・ハウンド</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is sent to the GY by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Lunalight" monster from your Deck, except "Lunalight Silver Hound", and if you do, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck, except "Lunalight" monsters, while you control that face-up monster. When a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated on the field (Quick Effect): You can banish from your GY, this card and 1 "Lunalight" Fusion Monster; negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Lunalight Silver Hound" once per turn.
